DOC.brief_summary: This trial is conducted in the United States of America (USA) and Canada. This trial is designed to show the effect of treatment with liraglutide when added to existing rosiglitazone and metformin combination therapy and to compare it with the effects of therapy with rosiglitazone and metformin alone.
DOC.brief_title: Effect of Liraglutide on Blood Glucose Control in Subjects With Type 2 Diabetes
DOC.criteria: Type 2 diabetes Treated with oral antidiabetic (OAD) drugs for at least 3 months Treated with one or more OAD and in moderate to poor glycemic control Body Mass Index (BMI) less than or equal to 45.0 kg/m2 Treatment with insulin within the last three months prior to the trial except due to intercurrent illness, at the discretion of the Investigator Any serious medical condition Treatment with any drug that could interfere with glucose level
